EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Honeywell Supplier Summit.2019_Global_SavetheDate_SupplierSummit_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date! Honeywell Aerospace Supplier Summit Invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear supplier,
You are among a select group of suppliers who are invited to our 2019 Honeywell Supplier Summit, which will be held April 3-4 at the Tempe Mission Palms, Arizona. Key summit themes will include business opportunities, supply chain initiatives, expectations, customers’ growth and its impact to our suppliers, among other important industry updates. You may be invited to additional meetings and will be notified separately if that is the case.
Day 1
April 3, 2019 Pre-Registration: 1:00 p.m.-6:00 p.m. Pre-Conference Sessions: 3:00 p.m.-6:00 p.m. Networking Reception: 6:00 p.m.-8:30 p.m.
Day 2
April 4, 2019 Registration: 7:30 a.m.Conference: 8:00 a.m.-4:00 p.m.
Location
Tempe Mission Palms
60 East 5th Street, Tempe, AZ 85281
The official registration is coming soon. If you wish to book your hotel now, please click here <[[https://gc.synxis.com/rez.aspx?Hotel=12318&Chain=15564&arrive=04/03/19&depart=04/04/19&adult=1&child=0&group=2UK392]]> - use Group Code 2UK392.
Please contact AeroSupplierCommunications@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:AeroSupplierCommunications@Honeywell.com]]> for questions and visa invitation letter needs. I look forward to seeing you at the Summit.
Sincerely,
Paul Ebertz Chief Procurement Officer Honeywell Aerospace
